Pali-English Dictionaries Type a word to search in the box below - use Velthuis scheme for diacritics (aa = ā, .t = ṭ, "n = ṅ, etc.).
Use the "Menu" button to change dictionaries and adjust the view.

CPED - Concise Pali-English Dictionary

DPPN - Dictionary of Pali Proper Names
